# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-105">준수 센터의 DLP(데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 준비가 된 많은 중요한 정보 유형이 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-106">이 문서에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형을 나열하고 DLP 정책이 각 유형을 감지할 때 검색하는 것을 보여 주며,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-108">키워드 및 체크 수표와 같은 증분 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-108">Corroborative evidence, like keywords and checksums, can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-110">중요한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-113">중요한 정보 유형이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-113">Sensitive information types are used in:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-114">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-114">Data loss prevention policies</span></span>](data-loss-prevention-policies.md) 
- [<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-115">민감도 레이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-115">Sensitivity labels</span></span>](sensitivity-labels.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-116">보존 레이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-116">Retention labels</span></span>](retention.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-117">커뮤니케이션 규정 준수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-117">Communication compliance</span></span>](communication-compliance.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-118">자동 레이블 지정 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-118">Auto-labelling policies</span></span>](apply-sensitivity-label-automatically.md#how-to-configure-auto-labeling-for-office-apps)

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-119">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-120">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-121">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-121">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-122">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-123">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-124">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-125">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-126">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-127">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-128">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-129">변형되지 않은: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-130">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-131">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-133">정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-133">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-134">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-135">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-136">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-136">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-137">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-137">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```


### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-138">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-138">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-140">aba number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-140">aba number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-142">aba</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-142">aba</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-143">abarouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-143">abarouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-144">abaroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-144">abaroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-145">americanbankassociationrouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-145">americanbankassociationrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-146">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-146">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-147">bankrouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-147">bankrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-148">bankroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-148">bankroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-149">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-149">routing #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-150">라우팅 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-150">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-151">라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-151">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-152">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-152">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-153">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-153">routing#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-154">RTN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-154">RTN</span></span>


## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-155">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-156">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-157">8자리 숫자(기간 유무)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-157">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-158">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-159">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-160">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-161">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-162">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-163">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-163">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-164">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-165">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-166">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-167">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-168">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-169">정규식은 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-170">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-172">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-172">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-175">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-175">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-176">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-176">dni</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-182">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-183">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-184">은행 주 분기 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-184">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-186">계정 번호는 6-10자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-186">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-187">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-188">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-189">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-190">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-191">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-192">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-194">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-195">정규식은 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-196">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-197">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-199">정규식은 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-200">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-216">오스트레일리아 비즈니스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-216">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-217">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-217">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-218">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-218">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-219">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-219">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-220">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-220">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-221">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-221">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-222">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-222">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-223">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-223">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-224">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-224">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-225">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-225">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-226">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-226">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-227">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-227">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-228">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-228">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-229">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-229">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-230">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-230">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-231">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-231">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-232">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-232">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-233">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-233">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-234">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-235">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-237">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-238">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-238">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-239">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-239">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-240">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-241">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-241">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_business_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-243">Keyword_australia_business_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-243">Keyword_australia_business_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-244">australia business no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-244">australia business no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-247">businessid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-247">businessid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-248">비즈니스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-248">business id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-249">abn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-249">abn</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-251">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-251">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-252">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-252">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-253">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-253">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-254">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-254">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-255">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-255">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-256">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-256">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-257">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-257">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-258">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-259">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-259">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-260">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-261">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-261">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-262">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-263">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-263">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-264">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-264">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-265">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-265">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-266">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-266">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-267">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-268">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-268">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-269">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-270">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-271">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-271">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-272">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-272">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-273">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-274">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-274">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-275">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-275">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-276">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-276">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-277">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-277">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-278">australia company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-278">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-279">australia company no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-279">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-280">australia company number(오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-280">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-281">australian company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-281">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-282">australian company no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-282">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-283">australian company number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-283">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-284">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-284">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-285">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-286">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-286">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-288">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-288">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-289">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-289">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-290">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-290">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-291">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-291">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-292">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-292">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-293">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-293">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-294">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-294">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-295">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-295">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-296">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-296">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-297">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-298">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-299">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-300">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-301">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-301">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-302">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-302">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-303">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-303">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-403">오스트레일리아 의료 계정 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-403">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-404">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-405">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-405">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-407">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-407">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-408">1자리 숫자가 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-408">1st digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-409">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-409">9th digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-410">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-410">10th digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-411">11자리 숫자(선택 사항)는 개별 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-411">11th digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-412">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-413">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-413">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-414">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-415">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-415">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-416">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-416">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-417">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-417">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-418">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-418">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-430">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-430">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-431">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-432">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-432">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-433">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-434">문자(대소문자 구분 안 하여 7자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-434">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-435">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-436">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-436">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-437">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-438">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-438">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-439">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-439">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-440">검색된 Keyword_passport Keyword_australia_passport_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-440">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-474">호주 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-474">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-475">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-476">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-476">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-478">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-478">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-479">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-480">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-481">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-481">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-482">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-482">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-483">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-483">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-484">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-485">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-486">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-487">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-488">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-488">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-489">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-489">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-490">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-502">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-502">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-503">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-504">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-504">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-505">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-506">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-506">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-507">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-508">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-509">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-510">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-511">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-511">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-512">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-639">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-639">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-640">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-640">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-641">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-641">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-642">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-642">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-643">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-643">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-644">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-644">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-645">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-645">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-646">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-647">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-647">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-648">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-649">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-649">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-650">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-650">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-651">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-651">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-652">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-653">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-653">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-654">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-655">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-656">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-656">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-657">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-657">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-658">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-660">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-660">identity number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-663">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-663">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-664">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-665">한 문자와 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-665">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-667">한 문자, 7자리 숫자 및 하나의 공백의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-667">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-668">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-668">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-669">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-669">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-670">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-671">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-672">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-672">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-674">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-675">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-675">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-676">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-677">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-677">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-678">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-678">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-679">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-679">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-680">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-680">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-693">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-693">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-701">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-701">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-702">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-702">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-703">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-703">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-704">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-704">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-705">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-705">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-706">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-706">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-707">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-707">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-708">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-708">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-709">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-709">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-710">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-710">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-711">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-711">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-712">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-712">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-713">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-713">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-714">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-714">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-715">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-716">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-716">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-726">krankenkassennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-726">krankenkassennummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-730">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-730">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-731">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-731">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-732">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-732">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-733">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-733">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-734">sozialversicherungsnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-734">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-735">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-735">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-736">sozialesicherheitkein #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-736">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-737">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-737">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-738">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-738">ssn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-742">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-742">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-743">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-744">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-744">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-745">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-746">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-746">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-747">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-747">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-748">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-748">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-749">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-749">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-750">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-750">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-751">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-751">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-752">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-752">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-753">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-753">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-754">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-754">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-755">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-755">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-756">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-756">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-757">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-757">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-758">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-758">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-759">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-759">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-782">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-782">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-783">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-783">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-784">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-784">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-785">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-785">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-786">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-786">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-787">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-787">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-788">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-788">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-789">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-789">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-790">11자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-790">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-791">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-791">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-792">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-792">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-793">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-793">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-794">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-794">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-795">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-795">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-796">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-796">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-797">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-797">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-798">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-798">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-799">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-799">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-800">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-800">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-801">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-801">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-802">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-802">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-803">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-804">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-804">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-805">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-806">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-807">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-807">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-808">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-808">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-809">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-810">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-810">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
