## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-828">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-828">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-829">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-830">문자열 "DocumentDb", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-830">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-831">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-831">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-832">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-832">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-833">3-200자 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-833">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-834">기호(>), 등호(=), 큰 물음표(") 또는 아포스트로피(')입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-834">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-835">소문자 또는 대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-835">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-836">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-836">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-837">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-838">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-838">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-839">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-840">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-841">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-841">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-842">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-842">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-843">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-843">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-844">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-844">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-845">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-845">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-846">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-846">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-847">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-847">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-848">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-848">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-849">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-849">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-850">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-850">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-851">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-851">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-852">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-852">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-853">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-853">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-854">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-854">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-855">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-855">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-856">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-856">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-857">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-857">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-858">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-859">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 다음에 문자열 "cloudapp.azure"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-859">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-860">com" 또는 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-860">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-861">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-861">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-862">net", 문자열 "Password" 또는 "password" 또는 "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-862">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-863">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-863">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-864">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-864">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-865">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-865">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-866">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-866">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-867">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-867">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-868">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-868">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-869">문자열 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-869">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-870">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-870">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-871">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-871">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-872">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-872">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-873">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-873">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-874">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-874">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-875">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-875">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-876">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-876">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-877">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-877">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-878">세미콜론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-878">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-879">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-879">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-880">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-881">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-881">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-882">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-883">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-883">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-884">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-884">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-885">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-885">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-886">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-886">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-887">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-887">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-888">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-888">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-889">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-889">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-890">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-890">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-891">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-891">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-892">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-892">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-893">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-893">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-894">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-894">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-895">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-895">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-896">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-896">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-897">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-897">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-898">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-898">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-899">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-899">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-900">Azure IoT 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-900">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-901">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-902">문자열 "HostName"과 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열("azure-devices" 문자열 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-902">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-903">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-903">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-904">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-904">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-905">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-905">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-906">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-906">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-907">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-907">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-908">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-908">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-909">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-909">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-910">문자열 "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-910">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-911">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-911">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-912">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-912">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-913">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-913">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-914">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-914">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-915">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-915">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-916">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-916">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-917">소문자 또는 대문자 43자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-917">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-918">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-918">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-919">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-920">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-920">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-921">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-922">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-922">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-923">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-923">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-924">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-924">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-925">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-925">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-926">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-926">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-927">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-927">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-928">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-928">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-929">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-929">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-930">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-930">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-931">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-931">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-932">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-932">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-933">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-933">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-934">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-934">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-935">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-935">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-936">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-936">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-937">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-937">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-938">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-938">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-939">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-939">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-940">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-941">"userpwd=" 문자열 다음에 영문 문자열이 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-941">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-942">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-942">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-943">문자열 "userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-943">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-944">소문자 60자 또는 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-944">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-945">인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-945">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-946">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-947">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-947">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-948">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-949">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-949">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-950">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-950">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-951">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-951">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-966">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-966">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-967">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-968">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-968">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-969">net" 다음에 문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-969">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-970">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-970">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-971">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-971">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-972">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-972">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-973">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-973">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-974">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-974">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-975">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-975">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-976">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-976">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-977">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-977">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-978">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-978">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-979">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-979">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-980">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-981">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-981">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-982">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-983">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-984">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-984">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-985">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-985">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-987">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-987">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-993">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-993">onebox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-998">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-998">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-999">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-999">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1000">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1000">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1001">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1002">문자열 "sig", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1002">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1003">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1004">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1004">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1005">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1005">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1006">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1006">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1007">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1007">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1008">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%) 중 소문자 또는 대문자인 43-53자 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1008">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1009">문자열 "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1009">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1010">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1010">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1011">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1011">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1012">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1012">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1013">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1013">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1014">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1014">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1015">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1015">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1016">Azure 서비스 버스 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1016">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1018">문자열 "EndPoint" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열("servicebus.windows" 문자열 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1018">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1019">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1019">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1020">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1020">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1021">문자열 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1021">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1022">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1022">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1023">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1023">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1024">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1024">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1025">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1025">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1026">문자열 "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1026">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1027">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1027">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1028">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1028">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1029">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1029">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1030">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1030">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1031">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1031">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1032">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1032">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1033">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1033">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1034">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1034">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1035">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1035">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1036">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1036">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1037">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1037">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1038">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1038">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1039">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1039">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1040">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1040">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1041">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1041">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1042">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1042">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1043">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1043">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1044">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1044">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1046">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1046">northwind</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1055">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1055">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1056">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1056">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1057">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열 다음에 문자열 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1057">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1058">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1058">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1059">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1059">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1060">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1061">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1061">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1062">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1062">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1063">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1063">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1064">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1064">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1065">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1065">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1066">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1066">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1067">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1067">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1068">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1068">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1069">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1069">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1070">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1071">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1071">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1072">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1073">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1073">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1074">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1074">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1075">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1075">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1076">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1077">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1077">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1079">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1079">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1080">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1080">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1082">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1082">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1083">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1083">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1086">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1086">sandbox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1092">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1092">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1093">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1093">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1094">Azure 저장소 계정 키(일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1094">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1095">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1096">아래 패턴에 설명된 86자 이하 또는 대문자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1096">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1097">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1097">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1098">기호(>), 아포스트로피('), 등호(=), 따오기 기호(") 또는 숫자 기호(#) 중 하나까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1098">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1099">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1099">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1100">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1100">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1101">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1102">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1102">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1103">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1104">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1105">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1105">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1106">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1106">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1107">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1108">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1108">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1110">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1110">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1111">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1112">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1112">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1113">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1114">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1115">`Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1115">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1116">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1116">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1249">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1249">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1250">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1251">11자리 숫자와 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1251">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1252">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1252">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1253">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1253">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1254">YY 형식의 6자리 숫자와 두 개의 선택적 기간 MM.DD 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1254">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1255">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1255">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1256">3개의 일차 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 홀수)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1256">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1257">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1257">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1258">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1258">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1259">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1260">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1260">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1261">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1262">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1262">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1263">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1263">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1264">검색된 Keyword_belgium_national_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1264">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1265">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1265">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1266">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1266">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1267">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1267">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1268">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1268">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->

          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />

        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">

      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1327">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1327">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1328">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1329">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 문자가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1329">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1330">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1331">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1331">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1332">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1333">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1333">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1334">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1334">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1335">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1335">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1336">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1336">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1337">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1337">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1338">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드를 찾거나 찾을 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 수 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1338">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1339">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1339">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1340">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1340">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1341">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1365">벨기에 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1365">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1366">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1366">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1367">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1367">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1368">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1368">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1369">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1369">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1370">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1370">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1371">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1371">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1372">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1372">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1373">12자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1373">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1374">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1374">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1375">12자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1375">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1376">문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1376">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1377">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1377">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1378">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1378">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1379">1에서 9까지의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1379">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1380">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1380">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1381">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1381">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1382">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1382">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1383">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1383">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1384">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1385">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1385">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1386">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1387">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1387">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1388">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1388">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1389">검색된 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1389">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1390">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1390">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1391">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1391">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1392">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1392">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1393">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1393">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1394">nº tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1394">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1395">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1395">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1396">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1396">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1397">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1397">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1398">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1398">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1399">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1399">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1400">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1400">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1401">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1401">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1402">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1402">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1403">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1403">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1404">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1405">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1405">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1407">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1407">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1408">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1408">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1409">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1409">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1410">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1410">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1411">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1411">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1412">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1412">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1413">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1413">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1414">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1414">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1415">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1415">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1416">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1416">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1417">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1418">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1420">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1421">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1421">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1422">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cpf 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1422">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1423">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1423">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1424">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1425">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1425">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1426">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1426">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1428">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1428">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1429">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1429">CPF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1431">Registration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1431">Registration</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1434">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1434">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1435">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1435">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1436">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1436">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1437">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1437">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1438">브라질 법인 번호(CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1438">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1439">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1440">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1440">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1441">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1442">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1442">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1443">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1443">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1444">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1444">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1445">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1445">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1446">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1446">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1447">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1447">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1448">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1448">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1449">4자리 분기 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1449">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1450">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1450">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1451">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1451">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1452">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1453">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1453">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1454">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1455">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1455">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1456">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1456">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1457">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1457">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1458">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1458">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1459">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1459">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1460">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1460">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1461">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1461">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1462">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1462">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1463">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1463">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1464">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1464">CNPJ</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1467">National Registry of Legal Entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1467">National Registry of Legal Entities</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1468">Taxpayers Registry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1468">Taxpayers Registry</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1469">Legal entity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1469">Legal entity</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1470">Legal entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1470">Legal entities</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1471">Registration Status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1471">Registration Status</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1472">Business</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1472">Business</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1473">Company</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1473">Company</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1474">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1474">CNPJ</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1475">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1475">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1476">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1476">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1477">CGC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1477">CGC</span></span>
