## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1483">브라질 국가 ID 카드(RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1483">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1484">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1485">Registro Geral(이전 형식): 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1485">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1486">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식): 11자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1486">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1487">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1488">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1488">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1489">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1489">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1490">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1490">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1491">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1491">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1492">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1492">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1493">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1493">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1494">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1494">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1495">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1495">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1496">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1496">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1497">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1497">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1498">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1498">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1499">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1499">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1500">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1501">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1501">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1502">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1503">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1503">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1504">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1504">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1505">검색된 Keyword_brazil_rg 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1505">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1506">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1506">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1507">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1507">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1508">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1508">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1509">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1509">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1510">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1510">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1511">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1511">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1512">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1512">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1513">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1513">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1514">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1514">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1515">RG(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1515">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1516">RIC(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1516">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1517">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1517">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1518">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1519">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1519">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1520">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1521">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1521">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1522">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1523">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1524">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1525">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1526">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1526">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1527">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1527">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1654">불가리아 uniform의 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1654">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1655">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1656">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1657">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1658">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1659">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1660">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1661">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1662">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1662">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1664">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1664">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1665">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1665">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1666">생년월일 순서에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1666">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1667">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자: 남성의 1자리와 여성의 홀수 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1667">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1668">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1668">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1669">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1670">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1670">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1671">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1672">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1672">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1673">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1673">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1674">키워드가  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1674">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1675">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1676">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1676">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1721">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1721">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1722">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1723">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1723">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1724">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1725">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1725">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1726">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1727">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1728">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1729">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1730">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1730">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1731">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1732">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1732">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1733">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1734">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1734">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1735">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1736">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1736">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1746">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1746">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1747">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1747">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1748">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1748">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1749">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1749">номер на паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1750">номер на паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1750">номер на паспорт</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1753">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1753">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1754">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1754">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1755">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1755">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1756">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1757">7자리 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1757">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1759">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7자리 또는 12자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1759">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1760">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1760">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1761">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1761">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1762">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1762">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1763">3자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1763">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1764">0 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1764">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1765">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1765">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1766">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1767">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1767">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1768">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1769">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1769">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1770">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1770">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1771">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1771">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1772">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1772">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1773">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1773">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1774">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1774">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1775">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1775">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1799">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1799">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1800">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1800">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1801">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1801">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1802">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1802">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1803">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1803">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1804">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1805">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1806">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1807">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1808">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1808">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1809">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1809">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1810">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1946">캐나다 보건 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1946">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1947">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1947">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1948">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1948">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1949">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1949">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1950">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1950">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1951">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1952">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1952">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1953">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1954">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1954">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1955">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1955">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1956">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1956">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1957">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1957">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1968">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1968">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1969">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1970">대문자 2개와 숫자 6자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1970">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1971">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1972">대문자 2개와 숫자 6자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1972">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1973">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1973">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1974">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1974">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1975">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1975">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1976">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1976">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1977">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1977">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-1978">검색된 Keyword_canada_passport_number Keyword_passport 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-1978">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2008">캐나다 PHIN(개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2008">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2009">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2009">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2010">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2010">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2011">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2011">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2012">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2012">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2013">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2013">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2014">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2014">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2015">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2015">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2016">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2016">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2017">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2017">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2018">검색된 키워드 또는 Keyword_canada_phin 키워드가 Keyword_canada_provinces 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2018">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2051">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2051">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2052">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2053">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2053">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2054">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2054">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2055">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2055">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2056">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2056">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2057">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2057">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2058">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2058">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2059">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2059">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2060">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2060">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2061">무형: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2061">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2062">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2063">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2063">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2064">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2065">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2065">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2066">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2066">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2067">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2067">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2068">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2068">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2069">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2069">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2070">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2070">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2071">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2071">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2072">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2073">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2073">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2074">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2074">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2075">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2075">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2100">칠레 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2100">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2101">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2102">7-8자리 숫자와 검사 숫자 또는 문자를 더한 세분화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2102">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2103">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2104">7~8자리 숫자와 디지타이터:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2104">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2105">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2105">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2106">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2106">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2107">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2108">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2108">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2109">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2109">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2110">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2110">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2111">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2111">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2112">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2112">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2113">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2113">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2114">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2114">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2115">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2115">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2116">이 Func_chile_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2116">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2117">검색된 Keyword_chile_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2117">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2118">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2118">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2119">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2119">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2120">이 Func_chile_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2120">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2121">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2121">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2140">nacional identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2140">nacional identidad</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2158">중국 거주 ID 카드(PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2158">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2159">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2160">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2160">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2161">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2162">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2162">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2163">주소 코드인 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2163">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2164">생년월일인 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2164">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2165">주문 코드인 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2165">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2166">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2166">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2167">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2167">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2168">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2168">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2169">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2169">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2170">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2170">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2171">이 Func_china_resident_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2171">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2172">검색된 Keyword_china_resident_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2172">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2173">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2173">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2174">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2174">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2175">이 Func_china_resident_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2175">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2176">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2176">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2177">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2177">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2178">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2178">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2179">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2179">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2180">PRC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2180">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2181">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2181">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2182">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2182">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2183">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2183">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2184">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2184">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2185">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2185">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2186">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2186">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2187">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2187">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2188">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2188">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2189">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2189">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2190">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2191">서식이 지정되거나 서식이 없는(dddddd) Luhn 테스트를 통과해야 하는 14-16자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2191">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2192">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2193">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 기프트 카드 및 다이너 카드를 비롯한 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드의 카드를 감지하는 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2193">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2194">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2195">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2195">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2196">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2197">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2197">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2198">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2198">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2199">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2199">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2200">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2200">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2201">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2201">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2202">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2202">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2203">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2204">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2204">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2205">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2205">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2206">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2206">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2466">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2466">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2467">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2468">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2468">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2469">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2470">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2470">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2471">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2472">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2473">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2474">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2474">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2475">`Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2475">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2476">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2476">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2600">크로아티아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2600">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2601">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2601">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2602">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2602">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2603">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2604">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2604">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2605">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2606">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2606">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2607">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2608">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2609">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2610">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2611">이 Func_croatia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2611">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2612">검색된 Keyword_croatia_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2612">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2643">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2643">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2644">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2645">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2645">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2646">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2647">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2647">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2648">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2648">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2649">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2649">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2650">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2650">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2651">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2651">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2652">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2652">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2653">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2654">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2654">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2655">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2656">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2656">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2657">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2657">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2658">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2658">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2663">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2663">passports</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2670">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2670">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2675">크로아티아 개인 식별(OIB) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2675">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2676">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2677">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2677">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2678">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2679">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2679">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2680">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2680">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2681">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2681">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2682">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2683">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2683">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2684">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2685">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2685">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2686">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2686">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2687">검색된 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2687">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2688">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2688">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2689">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2689">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2690">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2690">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2691">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2691">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2722">크로아티아 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2722">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2723">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2723">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2724">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2724">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2725">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2725">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2726">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2726">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2727">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2727">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2728">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2728">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2729">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2730">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2731">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2732">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2733">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2733">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2734">이  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2734">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2735">키워드가  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2735">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2736">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2736">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2737">이  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2737">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2754">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2754">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2755">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2756">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2756">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2757">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2758">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2758">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2759">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2760">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2760">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2761">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2762">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2762">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2763">`Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2763">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2764">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2764">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2889">키프로스 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2889">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2890">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2890">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2891">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2891">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2892">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2892">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2893">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2893">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2894">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2894">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2895">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2895">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2896">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2896">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2897">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2897">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2898">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2898">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2899">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2899">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2900">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2900">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2901">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2901">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2902">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2902">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2903">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2903">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2904">`Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2904">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2905">키워드가  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2905">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2906">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2906">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2907">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2907">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2910">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2910">kimlik karti</span></span>
