- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2912">개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2912">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2913">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2913">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2914">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2914">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2915">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2915">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2916">1개 문자와 공백이나 따로 공백이 없는 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2916">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2917">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2917">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2918">1개의 문자와 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2918">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2919">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2920">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2920">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2921">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2922">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2922">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2923">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2923">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2924">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2924">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2925">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD/MM/YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2925">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2926">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2926">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2927">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2927">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2928">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2928">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2957">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2957">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2958">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2958">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2959">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2959">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2960">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2960">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2961">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2961">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2962">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2962">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2963">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2963">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2964">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2965">지정된 패턴의 8자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2965">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2966">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2966">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2967">8자리 숫자와 한 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2967">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2968">a "0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2968">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2969">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2969">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2970">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2970">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2971">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2972">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2972">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2973">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2974">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2974">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2975">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2975">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2976">키워드가  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2976">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2977">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2977">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-2978">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-2978">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3006">체코 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3006">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3007">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3007">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3008">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3008">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3009">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3009">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3010">8개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3010">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3011">문자 'E'(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3011">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3012">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3012">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3013">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3013">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3014">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3014">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3015">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3016">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3016">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3017">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3018">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3018">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3019">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3019">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3020">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3020">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3146">체코 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3146">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3147">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3148">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3148">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3150">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3150">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3151">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3152">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3152">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3153">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3154">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3155">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3155">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3156">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3156">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3157">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3157">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3158">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3159">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3159">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3160">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3160">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3182">체코어 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3182">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3183">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3184">선택적 슬래시(이전 형식)가 있는 9자리 숫자(선택적 슬래시(새 형식)가 있는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3184">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3186">9자리 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3186">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3187">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3187">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3188">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3188">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3189">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3189">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3190">10자리 숫자(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3190">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3191">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3191">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3192">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3192">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3193">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3193">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3194">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3195">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3195">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3196">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3197">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3197">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3198">이 Func_czech_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3198">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3199">검색된 Keyword_czech_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3199">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3200">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3201">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3201">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3202">이 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3202">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3203">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3250">체코 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3250">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3251">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3251">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3252">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3253">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 백래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3253">10 digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3254">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3255">10자리 숫자 및 백사시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3255">10 digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3256">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3256">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3257">백 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3257">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3258">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3258">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3259">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3259">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3260">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3261">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3261">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3262">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3263">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3263">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3264">이  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3264">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3265">키워드가  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3265">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3266">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3267">이  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3267">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3268">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3268">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3269">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3269">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3270">birth number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3270">birth number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3271">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3271">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3272">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3272">personal identification number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3283">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3283">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3284">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3284">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3285">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3285">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3286">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3286">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3287">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3287">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3288">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3288">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3289">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3289">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3290">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3290">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3291">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3291">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3292">`Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3292">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3293">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3293">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3417">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3417">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3418">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3418">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3419">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3419">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3420">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3420">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3421">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3421">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3422">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3423">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3423">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3424">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3425">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3426">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3426">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3427">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3427">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3428">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3428">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3429">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3430">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3430">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3431">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3431">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3451">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3451">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3452">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3453">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3453">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3454">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3454">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3455">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3455">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3456">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3456">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3457">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3457">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3458">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3458">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3459">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3460">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3460">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3461">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3462">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3463">정규식은 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3463">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3464">검색된 Keyword_denmark_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3464">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3465">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3466">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3466">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3467">정규식은 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3467">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3468">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3468">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3540">덴마크 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3540">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3541">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3541">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3542">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3543">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3543">10 digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3544">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3545">10자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3545">10 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3546">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3546">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3547">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3547">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3548">시퀀스 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3548">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3549">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3550">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3550">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3551">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3552">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3553">이  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3553">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3554">키워드가  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3554">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3555">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3555">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3556">이  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3556">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3557">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3557">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3558">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3558">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3563">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3563">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3564">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3564">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3565">national number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3565">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3566">개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3566">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3567">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3567">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3568">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3568">cpr-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3569">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3569">personnummer</span></span>

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3570">DEA(마약 집행 기구) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3570">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3571">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3572">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3572">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3573">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3574">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3574">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3575">이 가능한 문자 집합의 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 하여) 등록자 코드인 abcdefghjklmnprstux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3575">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3576">등록자 성 또는 숫자 '9'의 첫 문자인 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3576">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3577">7자리 숫자( 마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3577">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3578">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3578">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3579">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3579">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3580">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3580">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3581">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3581">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3582">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3582">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3583">검색된 `Keyword_dea_number` 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3583">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3584">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3584">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3585">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3585">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3586">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3586">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3587">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3587">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3588">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3588">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3589">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3589">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3590">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3590">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3591">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3591">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3592">약 시행 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3592">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3593">약 집행 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3593">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3594">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3594">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3595">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3595">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3596">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3596">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3597">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3597">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3598">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3598">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3599">문자 "ET"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3599">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3600">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3600">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3601">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3602">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3602">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3603">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3604">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3604">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3605">`Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3605">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3606">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3606">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3732">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3732">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3733">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3733">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3734">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3734">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3735">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3735">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3736">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3736">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3737">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3737">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3738">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3738">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3739">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3740">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3740">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3741">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3741">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3742">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3742">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3743">생년월일과 생년월일(홀수 남성, 1~2세대, 1-2세대, 3-4: 20년, 5~6: 21 세기)에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3743">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3744">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3744">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3745">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3745">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3746">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3746">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3747">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3748">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3748">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3749">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3750">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3750">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3751">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3751">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3752">키워드가  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3752">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3753">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3753">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3754">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3754">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3755">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3755">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3787">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3787">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3788">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3789">문자 한 개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3789">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3790">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3791">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3791">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3792">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3793">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3793">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3794">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3795">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3795">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3796">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3796">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3797">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3797">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3798">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3798">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3799">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3799">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3800">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3800">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3801">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3801">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3802">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3802">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3803">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3803">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3806">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3806">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3807">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3807">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3810">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3810">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3811">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3811">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3812">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3812">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3813">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3813">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3814">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3814">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3815">eesti kodaniku passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3815">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3816">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3816">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3817">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3817">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3818">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3818">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3819">유럽 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3819">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3820">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3821">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3821">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3822">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3822">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3823">복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3823">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3824">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3825">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3825">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3826">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3827">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3827">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3828">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3828">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3829">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3829">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3830">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3830">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3831">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3831">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3832">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3832">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3833">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3833">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3834">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3834">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-3835">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-3835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4282">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4282">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4283">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4284">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4284">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4285">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4286">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4286">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4287">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4287">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4288">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4288">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4289">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4289">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4290">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4290">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4291">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4292">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4292">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4294">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4295">`Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4295">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4296">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4296">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4297">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4297">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4298">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4298">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4299">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4299">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4300">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4300">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4301">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4301">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4302">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4302">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4303">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4303">driverlicence</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4436">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4436">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4437">20자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4437">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4438">10자리 숫자 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4438">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4439">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4439">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4440">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4440">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4441">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4442">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4442">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4443">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4444">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4444">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4445">regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4445">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4446">검색된 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4446">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4464">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4464">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4465">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4466">6자리 숫자와 세 번째 숫자와 검사 숫자를 더한 세 자리 숫자를 나타내는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4466">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4467">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4468">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4468">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4469">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4469">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4470">century marker('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4470">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4471">3자리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4471">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4472">검사 숫자인 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4472">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4473">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4474">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4474">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4475">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4476">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4476">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4477">해당 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4477">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4478">검색된 Keyword_finnish_national_id 발견</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4478">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4479">체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4479">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4480">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4480">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4481">해당 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4481">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4482">체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4482">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4531">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4531">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4532">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4532">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4533">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4533">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4534">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4534">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4535">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4535">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4536">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4536">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4537">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4537">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4538">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4538">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4539">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4540">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4540">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4541">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4542">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4542">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4543">정규식은 Regex_finland_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4543">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4544">검색된 Keywords_eu_passport_number_common Keyword_finland_passport_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4544">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
