## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4565">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4565">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4566">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4566">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4567">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4567">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4568">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4568">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4569">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4569">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4570">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4570">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4571">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4571">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4572">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4572">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4573">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4573">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4574">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4574">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4575">이 Func_french_drivers_license 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4575">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4576">검색된 Keyword_french_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4576">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4703">프랑스 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4703">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4704">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4704">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4705">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4705">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4706">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4706">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4707">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4707">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4708">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4708">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4709">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4709">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4710">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4711">21자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4711">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4712">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4713">21자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4713">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4714">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4714">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4715">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4715">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4716">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4716">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4717">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4717">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4718">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4718">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4719">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4719">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4720">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4720">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4721">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4721">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4722">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4723">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4723">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4724">검색된 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4724">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4725">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4725">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4726">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4726">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4727">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4727">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4728">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4728">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4729">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4729">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4730">프랑스 국가 ID 카드(CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4730">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4731">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4731">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4732">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4732">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4733">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4733">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4734">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4734">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4735">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4736">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4736">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4737">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4738">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4738">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4739">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4739">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4740">검색된 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4740">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4741">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4741">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4742">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4742">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4743">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4743">card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4744">carte nationale d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4744">carte nationale d’identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4745">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4745">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4746">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4746">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4747">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4747">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4748">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4748">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4749">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4749">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4750">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4750">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4751">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4751">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4752">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4752">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4753">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4753">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4754">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4754">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4755">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4755">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4756">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4756">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4757">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4758">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4758">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4759">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4760">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4760">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4761">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4761">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4762">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4762">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4763">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4763">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4764">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4764">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4765">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4765">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4766">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4766">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4767">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4768">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4768">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4769">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4769">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4770">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4770">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4771">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4771">Keyword_passport</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4790">프랑스 사회 보장 번호(INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4790">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4791">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 및 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4791">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4792">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4792">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4793">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4794">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4794">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4795">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4796">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4796">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4797">13자리 숫자와 공백, 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4797">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4798">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4798">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4799">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4799">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4800">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4801">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4801">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4802">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4803">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4804">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4804">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4805">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4805">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4806">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4806">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4807">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4807">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4808">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4808">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4809">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4809">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4810">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4810">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4836">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4836">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4837">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4838">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4838">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4839">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4840">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4840">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4841">0, 1, 2 또는 3이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4841">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4842">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4842">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4843">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4843">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4844">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4844">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4845">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4845">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4846">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4846">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4847">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4847">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4848">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4848">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4849">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4849">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4850">검사 숫자 3개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4850">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4851">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4852">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4852">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4853">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4854">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4854">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4855">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4855">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4856">키워드가  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4856">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4857">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4857">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4858">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4858">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4859">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4859">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4860">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4860">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4861">numéro d'identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4861">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4862">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4862">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4864">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4864">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4865">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4865">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4866">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4866">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4867">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4867">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4868">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4868">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4869">에서 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4869">taxid#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4871">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4871">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4872">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4872">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4873">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4873">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4874">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4874">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4875">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4875">tin id</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4878">프랑스 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4878">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4879">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4879">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4880">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4880">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4881">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4881">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4882">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4882">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4883">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4883">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4884">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4884">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4885">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4886">영문자 13자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4886">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4887">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4887">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4888">13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4888">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4889">두 글자 - FR(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4889">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4890">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4890">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4891">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4891">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4892">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4892">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4893">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4893">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4894">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4894">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4895">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4895">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4896">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4896">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4897">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4897">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4898">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4899">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4899">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4900">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4901">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4901">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4902">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4902">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4903">검색된 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4903">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4904">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4904">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4905">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4905">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4918">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4918">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4919">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4919">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4920">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4920">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4921">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4922">11자리 숫자 및 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4922">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4923">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4924">11자리 숫자 및 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 됨):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4924">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4925">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4925">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4926">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4926">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4927">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4927">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4928">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4928">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4929">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4929">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4930">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4931">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4932">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4933">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4934">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4934">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4935">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4935">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-4936">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-4936">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5085">독일 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5085">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5086">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5087">2010년 11월 1일 이후: 9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5087">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5088">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지: 10자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5088">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5089">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5090">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5090">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5091">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5091">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5092">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5092">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5093">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5093">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5094">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5094">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5095">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5096">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5096">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5097">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5098">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5099">정규식은 Regex_germany_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5099">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5100">검색된 Keyword_germany_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5100">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5101">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5101">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5102">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5102">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5103">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5103">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5104">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5104">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5105">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5105">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5106">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5106">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5107">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5107">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5108">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5108">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5109">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5109">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5110">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5110">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5111">personal id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5111">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5112">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5112">personalausweis</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5115">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5115">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5116">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5116">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5117">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5117">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5118">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5119">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5119">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5120">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5121">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5121">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5122">첫 문자는 이 집합의 숫자 또는 문자(C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5122">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5123">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5123">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5124">이 집합의 5자리 숫자 또는 문자(C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5124">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5125">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5125">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5126">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5127">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5127">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5128">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5129">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5129">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5130">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5130">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5131">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5131">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5132">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5132">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5133">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5133">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5134">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5134">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5135">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5135">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5136">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5149">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5149">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5150">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5150">passport #</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5159">독일 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5159">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5160">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5161">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5161">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5162">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5163">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5163">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5164">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5164">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5165">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5165">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5166">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5166">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5167">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5167">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5168">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5168">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5169">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5169">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5170">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5170">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5171">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5171">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5172">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5173">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5173">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5175">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5175">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5176">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5176">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5177">키워드가  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5177">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5178">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5178">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5179">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5179">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5180">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5180">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5181">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5181">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5192">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5192">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5193">에서 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5193">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5194">이 열기 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5194">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5195">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5195">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5196">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5196">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5197">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5197">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5198">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5198">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5199">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5199">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5200">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5200">tin no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5205">독일 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5205">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5206">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5206">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5207">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5207">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5208">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5208">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5209">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5209">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5210">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5210">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5211">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5211">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5212">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5213">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5213">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5214">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5215">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5215">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5216">D 또는 d 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5216">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5217">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5217">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5218">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5218">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5219">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5220">선택적 공백 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5220">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5221">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5221">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5222">선택적 공백 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5222">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5223">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5223">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5224">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5225">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5225">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5226">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5227">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5227">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5228">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5228">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5229">검색된 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5229">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5230">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5230">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5231">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5231">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5232">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5232">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5234">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5234">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5235">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5235">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5236">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5236">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5237">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5237">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5238">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5238">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5239">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5239">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5240">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5240">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5241">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5241">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5242">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5242">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5243">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5244">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5244">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5245">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5246">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5246">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5247">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5248">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5250">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5251">`Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5251">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5252">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5378">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5378">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5379">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5379">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5380">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5380">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5381">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5381">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5382">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5382">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5383">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5383">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5384">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5384">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5385">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5385">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5386">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5386">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5387">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5387">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5388">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5388">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5389">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5389">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5390">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5391">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5391">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5392">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5393">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5393">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5394">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5394">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5395">검색된 Keyword_greece_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5395">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5396">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5396">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5397">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5397">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5398">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5398">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5399">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5399">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5400">그리스어 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5400">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5401">그리스어 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5401">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5402">그리스어 개인 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5402">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5403">그리스어 경찰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5403">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5404">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5404">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5405">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5405">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5406">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5406">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5407">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5407">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5408">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5408">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5409">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5410">문자 2개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5410">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5411">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5412">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5412">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5413">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5414">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5414">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5415">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5416">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5416">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5417">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5417">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5418">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5418">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5419">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM YY(예 - 28 8월 19일) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5419">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5420">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5420">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5421">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5421">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5422">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5422">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5423">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5423">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5424">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5424">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5439">그리스 AMKA(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5439">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5440">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5440">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5441">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5441">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5442">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5442">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5443">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5443">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5444">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5444">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5445">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5445">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5446">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5447">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5447">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5448">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5448">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5449">YYMMDD 생년월일로 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5449">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5450">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5450">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5451">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5451">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5452">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5453">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5453">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5454">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5455">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5455">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5456">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5456">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5457">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5457">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5458">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5458">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5459">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5459">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5464">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5464">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5465">socialsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5465">socialsecurityno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5469">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5469">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5470">그리스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5470">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5471">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5471">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5472">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5472">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5473">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5473">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5474">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5474">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5475">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5475">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5476">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5476">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5477">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5478">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5478">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5479">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5480">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5480">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5481">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5482">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5482">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5483">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5484">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5484">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5485">`Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5485">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5486">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5486">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
