## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5515">HKID(홍콩 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5515">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5516">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5517">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5517">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5518">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5519">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5519">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5520">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5520">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5521">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5521">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5522">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5522">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5523">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5524">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5525">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5526">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5527">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5527">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5528">검색된 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5528">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5529">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5529">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5530">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5530">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5531">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5531">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5532">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5532">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5572">헝가리 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5572">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5573">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5574">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5574">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5575">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5576">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5576">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5577">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5577">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5578">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5578">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5579">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5579">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5580">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5580">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5581">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5581">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5582">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5582">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5583">`Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5583">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5584">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5584">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5709">헝가리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5709">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5710">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5710">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5711">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5711">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5712">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5712">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5713">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5713">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5714">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5714">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5715">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5715">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5716">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5717">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5717">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5718">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5719">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5719">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5720">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1900년 이전의 여성, 2-여성, 기타 번호는 1900년 이전의 시민 또는 이중 시민권이 있는 시민도 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5720">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5721">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5721">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5722">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5722">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5723">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5723">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5724">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5724">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5725">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5725">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5726">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5726">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5727">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5727">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5728">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5728">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5729">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5729">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5730">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5730">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5731">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5731">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5736">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5736">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5737">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5737">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5738">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5738">ig.</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5742">헝가리 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5742">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5743">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5744">2개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5744">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5745">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5746">2개의 문자와 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5746">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5747">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5748">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5748">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5749">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5750">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5750">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5751">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5751">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5752">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5752">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5753">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5753">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5754">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5755">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5755">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5756">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5756">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5757">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5757">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5761">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5761">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5762">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5762">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5763">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5763">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5764">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5764">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5765">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5765">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5766">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5766">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5767">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5767">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5768">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5768">passport numbers</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5771">Útlevelek száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5771">Útlevelek száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5772">útlevél szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5772">útlevél szám</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5773">헝가리 TAJ(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5773">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5774">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5775">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5775">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5776">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5777">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5777">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5778">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5779">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5779">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5780">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5781">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5781">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5782">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5782">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5783">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5783">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5784">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5785">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5785">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5798">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5798">social security no</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5805">헝가리 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5805">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5806">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5806">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5807">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5807">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5808">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5808">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5809">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5809">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5810">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5810">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5811">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5811">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5812">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5813">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5813">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5814">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5815">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5815">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5816">"8"을 입력해야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5816">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5817">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5817">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5818">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5818">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5819">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5819">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5820">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5820">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5821">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5821">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5822">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5822">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5823">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5823">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5824">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5824">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5825">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5825">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5826">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5826">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5827">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5827">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5828">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5828">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5829">adóazonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5829">adóazonosító szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5830">adóhatóság szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5830">adóhatóság szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5831">adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5831">adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5832">헝가리어 주석</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5832">hungarian tin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5833">hungatiantin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5833">hungatiantin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5834">tax authority no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5834">tax authority no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5835">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5835">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5836">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5836">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5837">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5837">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5838">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5838">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5839">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5839">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5840">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5840">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5841">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5841">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5842">에서 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5842">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5843">이 열기 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5843">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5844">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5844">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5845">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5845">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5846">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5846">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5847">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5847">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5848">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5848">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5849">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5849">tin no</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5852">헝가리 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5852">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5853">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5853">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5854">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5854">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5855">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5855">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5856">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5856">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5857">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5857">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5858">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5858">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5859">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5860">영문자 10자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5860">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5861">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5862">영문자 10자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5862">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5863">두 글자 - HU 또는 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5863">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5864">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5864">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5865">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5865">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5866">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5867">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5869">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5869">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5870">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5870">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5871">검색된 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5871">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5872">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5872">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5873">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5873">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5874">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5874">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5875">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5875">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5876">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5876">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5877">부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5877">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5878">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5878">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5879">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5879">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5880">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5880">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5881">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5881">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5882">부가가치세 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5882">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5883">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5883">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5884">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5884">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5885">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5885">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5886">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5886">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5887">인도 PAN(영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5887">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5888">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5889">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5889">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5890">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5891">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5891">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5892">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5892">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5893">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5893">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5894">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5894">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5895">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5895">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5896">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5896">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5897">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5898">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5898">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5899">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5900">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5900">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5901">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5901">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5902">검색된 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5902">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5903">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5903">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5904">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5904">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5905">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5905">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5906">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5906">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5907">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5907">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5908">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5908">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5909">인도 고유 ID(Aadhaar) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5909">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5910">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5911">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5911">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5912">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5913">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5913">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5914">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5914">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5915">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5915">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5916">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5916">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5917">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5917">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5918">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5918">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5919">검사 숫자인 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5919">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5920">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5921">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5921">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5922">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5923">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5923">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5924">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5924">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5925">검색된 Keyword_india_aadhar 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5925">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5926">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5926">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5927">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5927">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5928">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5928">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5929">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5929">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5930">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5930">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5931">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5931">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5932">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5932">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5933">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5933">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5934">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5934">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5935">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5935">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5936">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5936">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5937">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5937">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5938">인도네시아 ID 카드(KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5938">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5939">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5939">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5940">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5940">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5941">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5941">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5942">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5942">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5943">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5943">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5944">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5944">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5945">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5945">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5946">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5946">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5947">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5947">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5948">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5948">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5949">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5949">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5950">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5950">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5951">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5952">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5952">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5953">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5954">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5954">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5955">정규식은 Regex_indonesia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5955">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5956">검색된 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5956">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5957">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5957">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5958">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5958">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5959">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5959">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5960">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5960">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5961">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5961">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5962">IBAN(국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5962">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5963">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5964">국가 코드(2자) 및 체크 숫자(2자리) 및 bban 번호(최대 30자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5964">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5965">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5966">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5966">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5967">2문자 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5967">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5968">검사 숫자 2개(선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5968">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5969">4개의 문자 또는 숫자로 1-7개 그룹(공백으로 구분할 수 있습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5969">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5970">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5970">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5971">각 국가에 대한 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5971">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5972">IBAN 중요한 정보 유형은 다음 60개 국가에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5972">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5973">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5973">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5974">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5975">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5975">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5976">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5977">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5978">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5978">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5979">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5979">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5980">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5980">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5981">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5981">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5982">국제질병 분류(ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5982">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5983">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5984">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5984">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5985">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5986">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5986">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5987">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5988">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5988">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5989">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5990">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5991">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5991">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5992">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5992">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5993">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5994">업데이트된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5994">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5995">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5995">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5996">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_updated 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5996">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5997">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5997">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5998">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_codes 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5998">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-5999">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드를 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-5999">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6000">국제질병 분류(ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6000">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6001">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6002">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6002">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6004">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6004">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6005">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6006">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6006">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6007">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6008">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6008">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6009">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6009">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6010">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6010">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6011">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6011">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6012">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6012">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6013">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6013">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6014">국제질병 분류Dictionary_icd_9_updated 9번째 수정, [ICD-9-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6014">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6015">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6015">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6016">[ICD-9-CM(ICD-9-CM)의](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)국제 분류인 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6016">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6017">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드를 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6017">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6018">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6018">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6019">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6019">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6020">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6020">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6021">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는(기간) 및 서식 없는(기간 없음) 버전을 계정하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6021">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6022">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6022">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6023">서식이 있는 IPv6 번호(콜론 포함)를 계정하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6023">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6024">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6024">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6025">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6026">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6026">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6027">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6028">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 경우 높은 신뢰도로 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6028">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6029">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6029">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6030">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6030">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6031">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6031">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6032">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6032">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6033">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6033">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6034">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6034">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6035">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6035">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6036">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6036">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6037">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6037">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6038">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6038">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6039">IP(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6039">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6040">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6040">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6041">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6041">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6042">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6042">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6043">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6043">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6044">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6044">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6045">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6046">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6046">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6047">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6048">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6048">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6049">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6049">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6050">4개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6050">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6051">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6052">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6052">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6053">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6054">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6055">`Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6055">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6056">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6180">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6180">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6181">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6182">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6182">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6183">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6184">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6184">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6185">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6185">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6186">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6186">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6187">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6187">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6188">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6188">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6189">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6189">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6190">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6190">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6191">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6191">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6192">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6192">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6193">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY(예제 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6193">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6194">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6194">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6195">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6195">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6196">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6196">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6220">아일랜드 PPS(개인 공용 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6220">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6221">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6222">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6222">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6223">7자리 숫자와 1-2개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6223">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6224">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6224">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6225">7자리 숫자와 문자 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6225">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6226">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6227">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6227">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6228">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6228">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6229">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6229">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6230">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6230">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6231">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6231">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6232">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6232">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6233">범위 A-I 또는 "W"의 선택적 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6233">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6234">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6235">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6237">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6238">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6238">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6239">검색된 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6239">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6240">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6240">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6241">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6241">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6242">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6242">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6243">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
