## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6288">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6288">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6289">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6290">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6290">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6291">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6292">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6292">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6293">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6293">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6294">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6294">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6295">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6295">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6296">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6296">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6297">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6297">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6298">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6298">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6299">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6299">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6300">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6300">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6301">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6301">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6302">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6302">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6303">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6303">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6304">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6304">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6305">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6305">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6306">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6306">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6307">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6307">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6308">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6308">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6309">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6309">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6310">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6310">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6311">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6311">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6312">이스라엘 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6312">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6313">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6314">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6314">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6315">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6316">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6316">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6317">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6318">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6318">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6319">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6320">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6320">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6321">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6321">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6322">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6322">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6323">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6323">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6324">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6324">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6325">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6325">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6326">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6326">מספר זהות</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6327">מספר זיה וי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6327">מספר זיה וי</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6328">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6328">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span></span>      
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6329">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6329">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6330">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6330">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6331">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6331">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6332">رقم الهوية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6332">رقم الهوية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6333">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6333">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6334">idnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6334">idnumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6335">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6335">id number</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6336">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6336">identity no</span></span>        
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6337">identitynumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6337">identitynumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6338">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6338">identity number</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6342">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6342">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6343">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6343">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6344">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6344">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6345">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6345">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6346">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6346">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6347">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6347">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6348">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6348">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6349">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6349">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6350">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6350">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6351">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6351">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6352">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6353">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6354">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6355">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6356">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6356">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6357">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6357">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6358">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6358">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6359">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6359">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6360">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6360">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6361">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6361">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6362">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6362">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6363">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6363">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6364">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6364">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6365">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6365">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6366">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6366">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6367">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6367">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6368">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6368">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6369">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6369">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6370">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6370">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6371">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6371">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6372">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6372">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6373">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6373">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6374">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6374">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6375">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6375">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6376">패밀리 이름에 있는 처음 세 자위에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6376">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6377">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자국어에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6377">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6378">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6378">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6379">생년월일의 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6379">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6380">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 2자리 숫자는 여성의 생년월일에 40이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6380">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6381">사람이 태어나는 시외 지역에 해당하는 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6381">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6382">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6382">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6383">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6384">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6384">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6385">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6386">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6386">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6387">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6387">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6388">키워드가  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6388">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6389">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6389">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6390">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6390">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6425">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6425">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6426">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6427">2개의 문자 또는 숫자 다음에 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6427">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6428">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6429">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6429">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6430">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6430">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6431">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6431">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6432">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6433">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6433">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6434">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6435">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6435">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6436">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6436">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6437">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6437">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6438">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY(예제 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6438">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6439">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6439">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6440">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6440">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6441">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6441">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6442">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6442">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6454">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6454">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6455">italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6455">italiana passaporto</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6457">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6457">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6458">numéro passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6458">numéro passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6459">numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6459">numero di passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6460">numeri del passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6460">numeri del passaporto</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6463">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6463">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6464">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6464">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6465">이탈리아 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6465">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6466">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6466">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6467">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6467">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6468">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6468">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6469">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6469">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6470">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6470">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6471">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6471">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6472">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6473">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6473">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6474">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6475">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6475">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6476">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6476">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6477">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6477">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6478">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6478">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6479">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6479">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6480">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6481">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6481">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6482">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6483">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6483">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6484">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6484">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6485">검색된 키워드가 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6485">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6486">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6486">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6487">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6487">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6488">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6488">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6489">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6489">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6490">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6490">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6491">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6491">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6492">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6492">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6493">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6493">iva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6494">iva #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6494">iva#</span></span>


## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6495">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6495">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6496">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6497">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6497">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6498">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6499">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6499">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6500">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6500">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6501">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6501">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6502">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6502">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6503">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6503">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6504">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6504">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6505">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6506">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6506">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6507">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6508">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6508">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6509">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6509">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6510">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6510">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6511">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6511">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6512">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6512">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6513">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6513">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6514">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6514">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6515">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6515">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6516">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6516">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6563">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6563">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6564">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6565">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6565">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6566">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6567">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6567">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6568">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6569">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6569">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6570">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6571">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6571">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6572">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6572">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6573">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6573">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6611">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6611">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6612">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6612">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6613">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6613">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6614">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6614">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6615">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6615">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6616">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6616">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6617">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6617">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6618">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6619">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6619">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6620">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6621">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6621">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6622">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6622">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6623">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6623">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6624">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6625">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6625">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6626">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6627">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6627">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6628">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6628">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6629">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6629">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6630">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6630">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6631">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6631">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6632">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6632">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6633">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6633">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6634">회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6634">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6635">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6635">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6636">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6636">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6637">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6637">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6638">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6638">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6639">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6639">個人番号カード</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6644">일본 내 번호 - 개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6644">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6645">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6645">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6646">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6646">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6647">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6647">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6648">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6648">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6649">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6649">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6650">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6650">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6651">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6652">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6652">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6653">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6654">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6654">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6655">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6655">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6656">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6656">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6657">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6657">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6658">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6658">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6659">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6659">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6660">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6660">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6661">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6661">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6662">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6662">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6663">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6663">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6664">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6664">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6665">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6665">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6666">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6666">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6667">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6667">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6668">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6668">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6669">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6669">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6670">my number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6670">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6671">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6671">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6672">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6672">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6673">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6673">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6674">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6674">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6675">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6675">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6676">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6676">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6677">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6677">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6678">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6678">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6679">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6679">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6680">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6680">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6681">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6682">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6682">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6683">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6684">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6684">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6685">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6686">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6686">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6687">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6688">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6689">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6689">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6690">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6690">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6691">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6692">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6692">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6693">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6693">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6694">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6694">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6695">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6695">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6696">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6696">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6697">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6697">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6698">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6698">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6699">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6699">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6700">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6700">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6701">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6701">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6702">೺೺固</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6702">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6703">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6703">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6704">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6704">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6705">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6705">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6706">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6706">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6707">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6707">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6708">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6709">12개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6709">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6710">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6711">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6711">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6712">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6712">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6713">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6713">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6714">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6714">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6715">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6716">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6717">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6718">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6718">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6719">정규식은 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6719">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6720">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6720">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6721">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6721">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6722">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6722">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6723">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6723">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6724">거주 카드 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6724">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6725">거주 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6725">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6726">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6726">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6727">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6727">在留カード</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6729">일본 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6729">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6730">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6731">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6731">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6732">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6733">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6733">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6734">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6735">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6735">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6736">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6737">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6737">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6738">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6738">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6739">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6739">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6740">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6740">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6741">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6741">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6742">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6742">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6743">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6743">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6744">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6744">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6745">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6745">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6746">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6746">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6747">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6747">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6748">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6748">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6749">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6749">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6750">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6750">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6751">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6751">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6752">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6752">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6753">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6753">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6754">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6754">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6755">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6755">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6756">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6756">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6757">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6757">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6758">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6758">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6759">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6759">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6760">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6760">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6761">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6762">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6762">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6763">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6764">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6765">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6765">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6766">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6766">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6767">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6768">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6768">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6769">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6769">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6781">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6781">社会保険番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6782">会保険No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6782">社会保険No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6784">介護保険</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6784">介護保険</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6785">介護保険被保険者番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6785">介護保険被保険者番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6786">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6786">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6787">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6787">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6789">厚生年金被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6789">厚生年金被保険者整理番号</span></span>


## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6790">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6790">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6791">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6792">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6792">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6793">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6794">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6794">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6795">3개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6795">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6796">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6796">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6797">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6798">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6798">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6799">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6800">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6800">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6801">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6801">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6802">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6802">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6926">vadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6926">vadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6927">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6927">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6928">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6929">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6929">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6930">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6931">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6931">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6932">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6932">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6933">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6933">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6934">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6934">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6935">생년월일 세기(19 세기의 경우 "0", 20년의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6935">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6936">4자리 숫자(임의로 생성)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6936">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6937">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6937">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6938">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6938">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6939">2자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6939">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6940">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6940">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6941">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6941">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6942">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6942">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6943">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6943">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6944">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6944">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6945">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6945">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6946">키워드가  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6946">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6947">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6947">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-6948">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-6948">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7011">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7011">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7012">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7012">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7013">2개의 문자 또는 숫자 다음에 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7013">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7014">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7014">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7015">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7015">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7016">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7016">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7017">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7017">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7018">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7018">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7019">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7019">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7020">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7020">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7021">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7021">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7022">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7022">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7023">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7023">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7024">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7024">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7025">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7026">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7026">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7027">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
