## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7050">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7050">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7051">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7052">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7052">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7053">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7054">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7054">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7055">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7055">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7056">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7056">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7057">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7057">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7058">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7058">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7059">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7059">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7060">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7060">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7182">vairuotojo pažymėjimas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7182">vairuotojo pažymėjimas</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7184">vairuotojo pažymėjimo numeriai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7184">vairuotojo pažymėjimo numeriai</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7185">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7185">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7186">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7186">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7187">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7187">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7188">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7188">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7189">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7189">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7190">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7190">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7191">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7191">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7192">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7193">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7193">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7194">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7195">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7195">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7196">생년월일과 성별에 해당하는 1-6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7196">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7197">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7197">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7198">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7198">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7199">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7199">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7200">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7201">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7201">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7202">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7203">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7204">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7204">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7205">키워드가  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7205">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7206">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7206">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7207">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7207">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7242">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7242">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7243">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7244">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7244">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7245">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7246">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7246">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7247">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7248">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7248">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7250">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7250">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7251">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7251">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7252">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7253">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7253">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7254">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7254">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7255">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7255">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7256">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7256">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7257">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7257">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7266">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7266">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7267">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7267">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7268">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7268">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7269">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7269">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7270">paso numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7270">paso numeris</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7271">paso numeriai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7271">paso numeriai</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7273">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7273">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7274">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7274">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7275">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7275">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7276">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7276">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7277">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7277">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7278">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7278">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7279">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7279">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7280">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7280">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7281">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7282">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7282">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7283">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7284">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7285">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7285">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7286">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7286">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7410">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7410">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7411">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7411">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7412">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7412">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7413">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7413">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7414">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7414">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7415">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7415">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7416">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7416">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7417">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7418">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7418">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7419">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7420">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7420">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7421">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7421">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7422">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7422">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7423">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7424">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7424">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7425">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7426">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7427">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7427">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7428">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7428">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7429">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7430">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7430">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7437">idpersonnelle #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7437">idpersonnelle#</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7453">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7453">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7454">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7455">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7455">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7456">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7457">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7457">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7458">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7458">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7459">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7459">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7460">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7460">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7461">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7461">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7462">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7462">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7463">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7463">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7464">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7464">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7465">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7466">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7466">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7467">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7467">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7498">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7498">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7499">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인이 아닌 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7500">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7500">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7501">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7501">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7502">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7503">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7503">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7504">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7504">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7505">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7505">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7506">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7506">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7507">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7507">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7508">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7508">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7509">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7509">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7510">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7510">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7511">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7511">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7512">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7513">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7513">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7514">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7515">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7516">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7517">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7518">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7519">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7559">말레이시아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7559">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7560">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7561">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7561">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7562">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7563">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7563">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7564">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7564">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7565">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7565">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7566">생년월일 코드 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7566">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7567">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7567">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7568">3개의 임의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7568">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7569">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7569">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7570">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7571">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7571">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7572">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7573">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7573">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7574">정규식은 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7574">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7575">검색된 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7575">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7578">디지털 응용 프로그램 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7578">digital application card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7590">kad pengenalan 말레이시아</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7590">kad pengenalan malaysia</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7592">kp no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7592">kp no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7593">mykad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7593">mykad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7594">mykas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7594">mykas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7595">mykid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7595">mykid</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7597">mytentera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7597">mytentera</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7601">개인 식별 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7601">personal identification card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7602">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7602">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7603">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7604">지정한 패턴의 2자 및 6자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7604">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7605">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7606">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7606">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7607">2자(숫자 또는 문자, 대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7607">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7608">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7608">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7609">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7609">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7610">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7610">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7611">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7611">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7612">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7612">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7613">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7613">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7614">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7614">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7615">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7615">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7616">`Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7616">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7617">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7617">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7739">liċenzja-tas-pqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7739">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7740">liċenzji-tas-tas-taswieq</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7740">liċenzji tas-sewwieq</span></span>


## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7741">몰타 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7741">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7742">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7742">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7743">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7743">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7744">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7744">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7745">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7745">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7746">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7746">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7747">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7747">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7748">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7749">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7749">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7750">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7751">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7751">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7752">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7752">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7753">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자(대소문자 미정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7753">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7754">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7755">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7755">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7756">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7757">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7757">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7758">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7758">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7759">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7759">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7760">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7760">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7761">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7761">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7762">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7762">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7763">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7763">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7764">citizen service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7764">citizen service number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7766">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7766">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7767">kodiċi personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7767">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7768">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7768">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7769">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7769">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7770">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7770">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7771">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7771">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7772">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7772">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7773">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7773">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7774">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7774">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7775">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7775">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7776">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7776">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7777">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7777">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7778">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7778">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7779">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7780">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7780">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7781">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7782">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7782">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7783">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7783">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7784">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7784">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7785">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7785">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7786">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7786">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7787">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7787">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7788">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7788">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7789">검색된 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7790">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7791">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7791">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7792">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7792">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7793">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7793">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7794">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7794">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7797">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7797">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7798">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7798">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7799">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7799">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7800">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7800">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7801">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7801">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7802">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7802">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7803">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7803">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7804">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7804">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7805">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7805">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7806">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7806">numru tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7807">numri tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7807">numri tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7808">Nru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7808">Nru tal-passaport</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7809">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7809">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7810">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7810">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7811">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7811">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7812">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7812">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7813">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7814">몰타 국가:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7814">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7815">지정된 패턴의 7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7815">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7816">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7816">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7817">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7817">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7818">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7819">몰타 국가: 7자리 숫자 및 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7819">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7820">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7820">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7821">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7821">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7822">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7822">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7823">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7823">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7824">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7825">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7825">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7826">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7827">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7828">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7828">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7829">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7829">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7830">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7830">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7831">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7831">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7864">네덜란드 시민 서비스(BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7864">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7865">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7866">선택적 공백을 포함하는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7866">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7867">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7867">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7868">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7868">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7869">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7869">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7870">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7870">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7871">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7871">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7872">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7872">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7873">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7873">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7874">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7875">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7875">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7876">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7877">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7877">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7878">이 Func_netherlands_bsn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7878">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7879">검색된 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7879">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7880">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7880">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7903">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7903">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7904">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7904">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7905">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7906">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7906">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7907">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7908">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7908">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7909">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7910">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7910">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7911">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7912">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7913">`Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7913">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-7914">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-7914">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8042">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8042">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8043">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8044">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8044">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8045">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8046">9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8046">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8047">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8048">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8048">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8049">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8050">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8051">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8051">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8052">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8053">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 검색합니다(예 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8053">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8054">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8055">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8055">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8056">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8074">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8074">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8075">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8075">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8076">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8076">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8077">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8077">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8078">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8078">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8079">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8079">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8080">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8080">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8081">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8082">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8082">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8083">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8084">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8084">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8085">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8086">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8086">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8087">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8088">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8088">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8089">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8089">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8090">키워드가  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8090">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8091">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8091">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8092">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8092">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8130">네덜란드 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8130">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8131">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8131">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8132">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8132">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8133">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8133">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8134">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8134">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8135">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8135">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8136">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8136">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8137">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8138">영문자 14자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8138">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8139">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8140">14자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8140">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8141">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8141">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8142">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8142">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8143">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8143">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8144">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8144">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8145">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8145">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8146">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8146">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8147">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8147">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8148">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8148">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8149">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8149">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8150">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8150">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8151">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8151">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8152">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8152">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8153">검색된 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8153">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8154">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8154">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8155">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8155">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
