## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8164">뉴질랜드 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8164">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8165">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8165">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8166">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8166">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8167">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8167">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8168">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8168">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8169">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8169">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8170">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8170">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8171">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8172">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8172">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8173">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8174">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8174">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8175">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8175">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8176">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8176">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8177">3-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8177">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8178">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8178">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8179">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8179">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8180">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8180">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8181">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8181">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8182">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8182">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8183">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8184">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8184">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8185">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8186">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8186">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8187">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8187">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8188">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8188">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8189">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8189">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8190">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8190">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8198">뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8198">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8199">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8199">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8200">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8200">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8201">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8201">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8202">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8202">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8203">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8203">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8204">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8204">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8205">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8206">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8206">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8207">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8208">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8208">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8209">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8209">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8210">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8210">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8211">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8212">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8213">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8214">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8215">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8215">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8216">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8216">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8217">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8217">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8218">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8218">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8285">뉴질랜드 내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8285">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8286">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8286">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8287">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8287">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8288">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8288">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8289">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8289">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8290">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8290">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8291">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8291">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8292">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8292">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8293">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8293">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8294">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8294">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8295">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8295">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8296">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8296">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8297">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8297">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8298">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8298">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8299">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8299">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8300">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8300">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8301">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8302">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8302">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8303">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8304">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8305">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8305">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8306">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8306">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8307">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8307">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8308">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8308">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8309">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8309">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8310">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8310">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8311">ird no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8311">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8312">ird no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8312">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8313">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8313">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8314">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8314">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8315">ird number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8315">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8316">내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8316">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8317">뉴질랜드 보건부 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8317">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8318">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8319">3개의 문자, 공백(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8319">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8320">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8320">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8321">'I'와 'O'를 제외한 3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8321">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8322">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8322">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8323">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8323">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8324">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8324">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8325">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8325">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8326">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8326">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8327">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8327">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8328">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8328">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8329">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8329">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8330">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8330">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8331">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8331">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8332">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8332">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8333">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8333">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8334">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8334">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8335">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8335">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8336">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8336">NHI</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8339">처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8339">treatment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8340">National Health Index Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8340">National Health Index Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8341">nhi number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8341">nhi number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8342">nhi no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8342">nhi no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8343">NHI #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8343">NHI#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8344">National Health Index No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8344">National Health Index No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8345">국가 상태 인덱스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8345">National Health Index Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8346">국가 상태 인덱스 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8346">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8347">뉴질랜드 사회 일지 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8347">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8348">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8348">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8349">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8349">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8350">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8350">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8351">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8351">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8352">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8352">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8353">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8353">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8354">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8355">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8355">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8356">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8357">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8357">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8358">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8358">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8359">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8359">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8360">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8360">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8361">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8361">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8362">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8362">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8363">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8364">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8364">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8365">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8366">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8366">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8367">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8367">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8368">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8368">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8369">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8369">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8370">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8370">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8371">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8371">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8372">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8372">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8373">social social #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8373">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8374">social social #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8374">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8375">social social social no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8375">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8376">social social number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8376">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8377">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8377">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8378">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8378">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8379">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8379">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8380">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8380">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8381">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8381">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8382">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8382">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8383">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8383">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8384">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8384">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8385">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8385">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8386">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8387">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8387">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8388">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8389">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8389">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8390">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8390">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8391">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8391">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8392">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8392">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8393">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8393">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8394">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8394">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8395">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8395">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8397">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8397">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8400">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8400">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8401">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8401">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8404">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8404">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8405">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8405">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8406">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8406">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8407">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8407">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8408">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8408">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8409">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8409">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8410">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8410">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8411">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8411">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8412">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8412">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8413">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8413">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8414">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8414">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8415">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8415">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8416">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8416">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8417">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8417">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8418">정규식은 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8418">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8419">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8419">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8420">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8420">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8421">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8421">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8422">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8422">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8423">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8423">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8424">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8424">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8425">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8425">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8426">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8426">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8427">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8427">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8428">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8428">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8429">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8429">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8430">14자리 숫자와 슬래시 2개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8430">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8431">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8431">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8432">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8432">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8433">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8433">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8434">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8434">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8435">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8435">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8436">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8436">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8437">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8437">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8438">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8438">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8439">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8439">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8440">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8440">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8441">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8441">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8565">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8565">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8566">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8566">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8567">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8567">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8568">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8568">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8569">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8569">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8570">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8571">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8571">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8572">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8573">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8573">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8574">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8574">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8575">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8575">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8576">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8576">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8577">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8577">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8580">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8580">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8581">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8581">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8582">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8582">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8587">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8587">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8588">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8588">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8589">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8589">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8590">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8590">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8591">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8591">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8592">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8592">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8593">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8593">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8594">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8595">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8595">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8596">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8597">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8598">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8598">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8599">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8599">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8600">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8600">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8601">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8601">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8602">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8602">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8603">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8603">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8604">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8604">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8605">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8605">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8606">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8606">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8607">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8607">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8608">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8608">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8609">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8609">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8610">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8610">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8611">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8611">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8612">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8612">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8613">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8613">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8614">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8614">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8615">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8615">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8616">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8616">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8617">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8617">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8618">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8619">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8619">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8620">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8621">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8621">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8622">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8623">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8623">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8624">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8625">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8625">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8626">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8626">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8627">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8627">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8628">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8628">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8629">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8629">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8630">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8630">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8631">Numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8631">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8632">Nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8632">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8633">Paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8633">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8634">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8634">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8635">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8635">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8636">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8636">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8637">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8637">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8638">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8638">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8639">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8639">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8640">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8640">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8641">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8641">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8642">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8643">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8643">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8644">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8645">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8645">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8646">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8646">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8647">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8647">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8648">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8648">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8649">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8649">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8650">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8651">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8653">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8653">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8654">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8654">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8655">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8655">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8656">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8656">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8657">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8657">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8658">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8659">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8659">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8660">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8660">regon id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8661">통계 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8661">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8662">statistical id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8662">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8663">statistical no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8663">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8664">regon number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8664">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8665">regonid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8665">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8666">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8666">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8667">company id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8667">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8668">companyid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8668">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8669">companyidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8669">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8670">numer statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8670">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8671">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8671">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8672">numerstatystyczny #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8672">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8673">numeruregon #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8673">numeruregon#</span></span>


## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8674">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8674">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8675">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8675">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8676">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8676">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8677">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8677">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8678">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8678">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8679">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8679">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8680">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8680">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8681">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8682">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8682">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8683">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8684">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8685">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8686">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8686">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8687">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8688">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8688">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8689">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8689">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8690">키워드가  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8690">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8720">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8720">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8721">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8722">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8722">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8723">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8724">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8724">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8725">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8726">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8726">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8727">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8728">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8729">정규식은 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8729">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8730">검색된 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8730">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8750">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8750">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8751">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8752">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8752">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8753">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8754">패턴 1: 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8754">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8755">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8755">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8756">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8756">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8757">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8757">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8758">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8758">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8759">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8759">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8760">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8760">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8761">1개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8761">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8762">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8762">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8763">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8763">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8764">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8764">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8765">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8765">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8766">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8767">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8768">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8769">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8770">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8770">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8771">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8903">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8903">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8904">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8905">문자 한 개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8905">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8906">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8907">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8907">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8908">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8908">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8909">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8909">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8910">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8911">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8912">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8913">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8913">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8914">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8914">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8915">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8916">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8916">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8917">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8917">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8918">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8918">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8919">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8919">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8946">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8946">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8947">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8947">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8948">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8948">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8949">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8949">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8950">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8950">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8951">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8951">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8952">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8952">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8953">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8953">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8954">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8954">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8955">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8956">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8956">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8957">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8958">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8959">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8959">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8960">키워드가  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8960">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8961">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8961">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8962">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8962">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8987">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8987">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8988">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8989">한 문자와 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8989">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8990">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8990">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8991">문자 1개와 숫자 8자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8991">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8992">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8992">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8993">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8993">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8994">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8995">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8995">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8996">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8997">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8997">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8998">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8998">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-8999">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-8999">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
