## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9127">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9127">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9128">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9128">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9129">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9129">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9130">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9130">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9131">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9131">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9132">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9132">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9133">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9133">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9134">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9135">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9135">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9136">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9137">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9137">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9138">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9138">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9139">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9139">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9140">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9140">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9141">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9142">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9142">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9143">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9144">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9144">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9145">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9145">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9146">키워드가  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9146">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9147">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9148">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9148">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9199">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9199">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9200">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9201">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9201">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9202">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9203">8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9203">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9204">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9205">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9205">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9206">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9207">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9208">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9208">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9209">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9209">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9210">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예제- 01 FEB/FEB 10) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9210">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9211">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9211">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9212">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9212">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9213">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9213">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9227">numuirul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9227">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9231">러시아 여권 번호 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9231">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9232">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9232">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9233">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9233">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9234">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9234">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9235">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9235">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9236">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9236">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9237">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9237">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9238">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9238">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9239">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9239">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9240">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9240">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9241">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9241">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9242">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9242">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9243">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9243">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9244">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9244">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9245">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9245">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9246">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9246">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9247">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9248">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9248">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9250">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9251">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9251">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9252">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9252">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9269">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9269">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9270">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9270">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9271">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9271">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9272">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9272">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9273">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9273">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9274">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9274">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9275">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9275">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9276">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9277">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9277">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9278">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9279">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9279">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9280">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9280">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9281">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9281">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9282">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9282">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9283">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9283">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9284">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9284">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9285">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9285">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9286">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9287">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9287">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9288">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9288">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9305">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9305">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9306">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9307">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9307">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9308">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9309">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9309">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9310">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9311">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9311">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9312">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9313">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9313">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9314">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9314">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9315">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9315">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9316">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9316">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9317">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9317">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9318">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9318">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9319">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9319">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9320">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9320">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9321">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9321">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9322">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9322">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9323">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9323">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9324">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9324">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9325">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9325">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9326">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9326">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9327">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9327">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9328">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9328">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9329">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9329">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9330">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9330">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9331">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9331">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9332">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9332">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9333">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9333">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9334">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9334">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9335">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_singapore_nric 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9335">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9336">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9336">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9337">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9338">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9338">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9339">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9339">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9340">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9340">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9341">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9341">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9342">National Registration Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9342">National Registration Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9343">Identity Card Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9343">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9344">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9344">NRIC</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9350">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9350">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9351">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9352">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9352">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9353">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9354">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9354">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9355">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9355">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9356">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9356">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9357">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9358">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9358">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9359">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9360">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9360">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9361">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9361">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9362">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9488">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9488">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9489">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9489">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9490">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9490">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9491">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9491">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9492">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9492">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9493">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9493">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9494">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9494">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9495">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9496">선택적 백사시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9496">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9497">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9497">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9498">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9498">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9499">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9499">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9500">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9500">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9501">선택적 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9501">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9502">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9503">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9503">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9504">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9505">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9505">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9506">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9506">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9507">키워드가  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9507">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9508">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9509">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9509">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9556">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9556">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9557">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9558">1자리 숫자 또는 문자, 공백이나 따로 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9558">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9559">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9560">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ),7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9560">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9561">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9562">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9563">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9564">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9564">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9565">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9565">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9566">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9567">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9567">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9568">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9568">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9569">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9569">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9570">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9570">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">

            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />

        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9592">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9592">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9593">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9593">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9594">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9594">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9595">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9595">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9596">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9596">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9597">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9598">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9598">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9599">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9600">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9601">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9601">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9602">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9729">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9729">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9730">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9730">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9731">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9731">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9732">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9732">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9733">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9733">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9734">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9734">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9735">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9735">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9736">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9737">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9737">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9738">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9739">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9739">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9740">생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자입니다. 여기서 "LLL"은 생년월일의 마지막 세 자리 숫자에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9740">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9741">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9741">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9742">같은 날에 출산한 사람의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 3자리 숫자(남성 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9742">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9743">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9743">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9744">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9744">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9745">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9745">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9746">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9746">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9747">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9747">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9748">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9748">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9749">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9749">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9750">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9750">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9751">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9751">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9779">스로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9779">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9780">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9781">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9781">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9783">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9783">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9784">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9784">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9785">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9785">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9786">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9786">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9787">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9788">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9788">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9789">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9790">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9790">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9791">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9791">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9792">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9792">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9793">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9793">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9794">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9794">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9795">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9795">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9796">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9796">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9819">스로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9819">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9820">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9820">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9821">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9821">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9822">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9822">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9823">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9823">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9824">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9824">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9825">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9825">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9826">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9827">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9827">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9828">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9828">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9829">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9829">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9830">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9830">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9831">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9831">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9832">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9833">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9833">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9834">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9835">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9835">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9836">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9836">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9837">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9837">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9838">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9838">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9839">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9839">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9863">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9863">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9864">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9865">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9865">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9867">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9867">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9868">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9868">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9869">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9869">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9870">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9870">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9871">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9871">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9872">체크 아웃 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9872">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9873">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9874">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9874">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9876">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9877">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9877">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9878">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9878">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9879">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9879">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9880">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9880">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9882">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9882">Identity card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9884">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9884">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9885">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9885">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9886">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9887">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9887">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9888">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9888">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9889">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9889">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9890">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9890">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9891">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9891">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9892">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9892">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9893">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9893">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9894">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9894">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9895">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9895">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9896">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9897">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9897">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9898">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9899">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9899">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9900">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9900">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9901">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9901">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9902">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9902">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9903">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9903">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9904">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9904">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9905">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9905">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9906">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9906">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9907">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9907">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9908">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9908">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9909">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9909">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9910">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9910">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9911">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9911">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9912">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9912">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9913">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9913">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9914">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9915">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9915">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9916">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9917">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9917">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9918">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9918">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9919">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9919">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9920">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9921">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9921">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9922">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9923">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9923">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9924">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9924">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9925">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9925">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9926">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9926">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-9927">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-9927">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10061">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10061">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10062">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10062">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10063">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10063">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10064">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10064">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10065">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10065">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10066">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10066">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10067">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10067">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10068">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10069">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10069">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10070">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10071">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10071">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10072">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10072">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10073">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10073">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10074">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10074">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10075">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10076">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10076">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10077">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10078">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10078">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10079">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10079">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10080">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10080">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10081">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10081">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10082">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10082">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10106">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10106">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10107">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10108">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10108">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10110">8-9자 또는 9자 조합 문자와 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10110">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10111">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10111">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10112">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10112">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10113">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10113">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10114">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10115">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10115">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10116">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10117">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10117">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10118">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10118">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10119">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10119">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10120">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD-MM-YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10120">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10121">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10122">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10122">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10123">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10123">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
