## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10152">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10152">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10153">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10153">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10154">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10154">It's  available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10155">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10156">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10156">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10157">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10158">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10158">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10159">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10159">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10160">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10160">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10161">7~8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10161">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10162">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10162">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10163">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10163">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10164">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10164">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10165">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10165">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10166">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10166">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10167">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10167">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10168">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10168">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10169">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10170">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10170">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10171">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10171">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10172">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10172">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10173">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10174">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10175">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10176">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10177">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10178">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10179">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10180">지정한 패턴의 7-8자리 숫자와 1-2개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10180">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10181">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10182">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10182">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10183">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10183">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10184">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10184">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10185">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10185">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10186">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10186">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10187">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10187">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10188">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10188">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10189">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10189">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10190">대문자 1자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10190">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10191">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10191">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10192">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10192">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10193">내국인 식별 번호가 있는 외신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10193">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10194">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10194">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10195">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10195">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10196">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10196">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10197">외신의 ID 번호가 없는 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10197">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10198">"M"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10198">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10199">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10199">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10200">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10200">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10201">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10202">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10202">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10203">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10204">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10205">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10205">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10206">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10206">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10207">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10208">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10208">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10239">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10239">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10240">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10241">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10241">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10242">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10242">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10243">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10243">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10244">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10244">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10245">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" 여기서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10245">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10246">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10246">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10247">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미클론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10247">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10248">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 따오기 표시(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10248">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10249">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10249">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10250">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10251">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10251">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10252">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10253">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10253">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10254">정규식은 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10254">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10255">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10255">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10256">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10256">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10257">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10257">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10258">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10258">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10259">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10259">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10260">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10260">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10261">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10261">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10262">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10262">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10263">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10263">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10264">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10264">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10265">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10265">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10266">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) -OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10266">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10267">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10267">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10268">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10268">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10269">기호보다 작음(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10269">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10270">대/소문자, 자릿수, 상용구(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10270">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10271">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10271">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10272">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10272">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10273">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10273">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10274">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10274">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10275">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10275">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10276">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10276">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10277">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10277">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10278">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10278">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10279">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10279">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10280">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10280">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10281">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10281">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10282">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10282">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10283">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10283">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10284">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10284">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10285">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10285">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10286">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10287">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10287">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10288">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10289">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10289">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10290">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10290">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10291">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10291">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10292">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10292">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10293">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10294">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10294">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10296">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10296">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10297">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10297">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10298">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10298">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10433">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10433">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10434">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10435">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10435">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10436">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10436">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10437">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10437">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10438">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10438">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10439">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10439">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10440">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10441">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10441">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10442">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10443">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10443">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10444">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10444">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10445">검색된 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10445">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10446">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10446">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10447">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10447">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10448">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10448">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10449">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10449">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10455">identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10455">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10456">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10456">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10457">identifikationsnumret #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10457">identifikationsnumret#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10458">identifikationsnumret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10458">identifikationsnumret</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10459">identitetshandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10459">identitetshandling</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10460">ID 문서</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10460">identity document</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10461">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10461">identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10462">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10462">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10463">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10463">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10464">personal id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10464">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10465">personnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10465">personnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10466">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10466">personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10467">steidentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10467">skatteidentifikationsnummer</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10468">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10468">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10469">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10469">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10470">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10470">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10471">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10471">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10472">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10472">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10473">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10473">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10474">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10474">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10475">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10475">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10476">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10476">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10477">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10477">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10478">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10478">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10479">다음 중 하나는 true입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10479">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10480">검색된 Keyword_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10480">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10481">검색된 Keyword_sweden_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10481">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10512">스웨덴 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10512">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10513">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10513">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10514">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10515">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10515">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10516">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10517">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10517">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10518">생년월일에 해당하는 8자리 숫자(YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10518">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10519">일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자는 여기서:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10519">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10520">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 성별을 남성의 홀수와 여성의 등수로 할당한 성별을 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10520">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10521">1990년 이전의 일련 번호 할당은 해당 번호의 원주민이 태어나는 시에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10521">Before 1990, the assignment of a serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10522">또는 1947년 1월 1일 세금 기록에 따라 이민자에 대한 특수 코드(일반적으로 9번째 숫자)를 사용하여 생년월일인 경우(1947년 7월 1일 이전의 생년월일)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10522">Or (if born before 1947) where they had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the seventh digit) for immigrants.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10523">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10523">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10524">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10525">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10525">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10526">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10527">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10527">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10528">이  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10528">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10529">키워드가  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10529">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10530">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10530">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10531">이  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10531">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10538">identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10538">identification no</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10547">스웨덴 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10547">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10548">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10548">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10549">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10549">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10550">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10550">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10551">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10551">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10552">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10552">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10553">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10553">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10554">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10555">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10555">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10556">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10557">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10557">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10558">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10558">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10559">더하기 기호 또는 minus 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10559">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10560">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 3자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10560">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10561">1990년 이전 발급된 숫자의 경우 7-8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외세의 신생아를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10561">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10562">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성의 홀수 또는 심지어 여성으로 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10562">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10563">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10563">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10564">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10564">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10565">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10565">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10566">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10566">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10567">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10567">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10568">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10568">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10569">키워드가  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10569">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10570">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10570">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10571">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10571">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10590">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10590">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10597">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10597">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10598">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10598">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10599">4개의 문자와 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10599">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10600">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10600">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10601">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10601">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10602">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10602">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10603">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10603">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10604">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10604">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10605">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10605">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10606">1~3자리 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10606">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10607">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10608">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10609">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10610">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10611">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10611">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10612">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10612">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10613">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10613">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_swift"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10614">Keyword_swift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10614">Keyword_swift</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10615">international organization for standardization 9362</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10615">international organization for standardization 9362</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10616">iso 9362</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10616">iso 9362</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10617">iso9362</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10617">iso9362</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10618">swift #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10618">swift#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10619">swiftcode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10619">swiftcode</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10620">swiftnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10620">swiftnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10621">swiftroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10621">swiftroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10622">swift code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10622">swift code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10623">swift number #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10623">swift number #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10624">swift routing number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10624">swift routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10625">bic number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10625">bic number</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10649">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10649">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10650">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10650">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10651">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10651">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10652">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10652">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10653">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10653">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10654">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10654">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10655">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10655">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10656">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10656">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10657">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10657">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10658">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10658">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10659">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10659">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10660">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10660">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10661">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10661">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10662">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10662">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10663">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10663">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10664">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10664">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10665">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10665">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10666">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10666">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10667">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10668">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10668">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10670">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10670">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10671">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10671">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10672">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10672">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10673">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10674">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10674">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10692">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10692">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10693">identification personnelle id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10693">identification personnelle id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10694">numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10694">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10695">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10695">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10696">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10696">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10697">한 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10697">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10698">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10698">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10699">한 문자(영어)와 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10699">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10700">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않는 영어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10700">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10701">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10701">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10702">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10702">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10703">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10704">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10704">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10705">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10706">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10707">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10707">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10708">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10708">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10709">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10709">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10710">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10710">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10711">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10711">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10712">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10712">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10716">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10716">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10717">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10717">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10718">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10718">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10719">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10719">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10720">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10720">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10721">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10721">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10722">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10722">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10723">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10723">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10724">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10724">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10725">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10725">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10726">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10726">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10727">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10727">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10728">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10728">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10729">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10729">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10730">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10730">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10731">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10731">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10732">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10732">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10733">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10733">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10734">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10734">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10735">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10735">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10736">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10736">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10737">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10737">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10738">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10738">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10739">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10740">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10740">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10741">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10742">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10742">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10743">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10743">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10744">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10744">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10745">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10745">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10746">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10746">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10747">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10747">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10748">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10748">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10749">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10749">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10750">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10750">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10751">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10751">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10752">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10752">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10753">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10753">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10754">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10754">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10755">대만 거주자 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10755">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10756">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10757">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10757">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10759">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10759">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10760">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10760">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10761">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10761">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10762">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10763">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10764">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10765">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10765">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10766">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10766">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10767">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10767">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10768">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10769">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10769">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10770">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10770">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10771">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10771">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10772">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10772">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10773">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10773">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10774">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10774">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10775">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10775">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10776">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10776">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10777">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10777">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10778">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10778">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10779">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10779">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10780">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10780">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10781">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10781">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10782">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10783">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10783">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10784">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10785">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10785">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10786">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10786">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10787">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10787">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10788">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10789">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10790">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10791">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10792">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10792">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10793">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10793">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10794">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10794">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10795">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10795">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10796">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10796">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10797">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10797">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10798">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10798">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10799">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10799">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10800">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10800">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10801">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10801">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10802">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10802">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10803">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10803">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10804">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10804">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10805">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10805">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10806">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10806">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10807">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10807">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10808">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10808">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10809">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10809">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10810">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10810">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10811">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10811">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10812">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10813">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10813">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10814">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10814">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10815">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10815">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10816">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10816">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10817">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10817">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10818">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10818">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10819">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10819">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10820">TC Kimlik numarasas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10820">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10821">바타르다얀크 누마라소드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10821">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10822">Vatandaandaandalandak no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10822">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10823">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10823">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10824">driver's license number(운전 면허 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10824">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10825">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10825">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10826">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10826">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10827">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10828">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10828">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10829">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10830">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10830">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10831">5자리 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10831">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10832">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10832">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10833">생년월일의 날짜 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10833">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10834">드라이버가 여성인 경우 7번째 문자가 50으로 증가합니다. 검사의 경우 01에서 12까지가 아니라 51에서 62까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10834">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10835">대소문자 구분 안 2개 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10835">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10836">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10836">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10837">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10838">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10839">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10840">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10840">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10841">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10841">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10842">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10842">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10843">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10843">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
