- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10852">삼각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10852">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10853">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10853">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10854">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10854">photocard licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10855">learner drivers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10855">learner drivers</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10858">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10858">driving licences</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10861">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10861">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10862">electoral roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10862">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10863">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10864">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10864">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10865">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10866">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10866">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10867">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10868">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10869">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10870">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10870">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10871">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10871">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10872">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10872">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10873">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10873">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10874">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10874">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10875">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10875">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10876">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10876">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10877">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10877">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10878">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10878">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10879">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10879">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10880">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10880">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10881">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10882">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10882">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10883">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10884">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10884">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10885">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10885">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10886">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10886">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10887">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10887">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10888">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10888">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10889">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10889">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10890">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10891">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10892">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10893">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10894">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10894">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10895">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10895">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10896">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10896">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10897">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10897">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10898">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10898">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10899">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10900">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10900">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10901">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10901">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10902">국립 보건 서비스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10902">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10903">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10903">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10904">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10904">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10905">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10905">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10906">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10906">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10907">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10907">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10908">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10908">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10909">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10909">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10910">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10910">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10911">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10911">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10912">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10912">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10913">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10913">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10914">D.O.B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10914">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10915">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10915">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10916">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10916">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10917">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10917">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10918">NINO(national insurance number)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10918">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10919">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10919">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10920">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10920">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10921">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10922">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10922">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10923">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10924">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10924">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10925">두 글자(유효한 NOS는 이 패턴이 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자는 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10925">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10926">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10926">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10927">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10927">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10928">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10928">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10929">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10929">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10930">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10930">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10931">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10931">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10932">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10932">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10933">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10933">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10934">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10934">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10935">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10935">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10936">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10936">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10937">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10937">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10938">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10939">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10939">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10940">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10941">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10941">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10942">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10942">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10943">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10943">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10944">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10944">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10945">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10945">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10967">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10967">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10968">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10968">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10969">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10969">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10970">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10970">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10971">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10971">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10972">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10972">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10973">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10973">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10974">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10974">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10975">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10976">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10976">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10977">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10978">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10978">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10979">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10980">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10980">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10981">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10982">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10982">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10983">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10983">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-10984">키워드가  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-10984">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11004">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11004">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11005">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11005">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11006">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11006">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11007">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11007">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11008">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11008">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11009">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11009">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11010">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11010">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11011">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11011">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11012">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11012">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11013">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11013">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11014">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11014">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11044">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11044">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11045">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11046">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11046">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11047">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11048">종속됩니다. 예를 들어 뉴욕:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11048">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11049">ddd ddd ddd와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11049">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11050">ddddddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11050">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11051">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11052">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11052">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11053">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11054">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11055">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11055">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11056">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11056">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11057">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11057">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11058">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11058">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11059">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11059">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11060">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11060">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11061">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11061">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11062">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11062">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11150">Driver's Lics#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11150">Driver's Lics#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11151">Driver's License#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11151">Driver's License#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11152">Driver's Licenses#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11152">Driver's Licenses#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11153">id card#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11153">id card#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11154">id cards#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11154">id cards#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11155">identification card#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11155">identification card#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11156">identification cards#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11156">identification cards#</span></span> 


#### <a name="keyword_state_name_drivers_license_name"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11157">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11157">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11158">상태 약어(예: "NY")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11158">state abbreviation (for example, "NY")</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11159">주 이름(예: "New York")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11159">state name (for example, "New York")</span></span>

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11160">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11160">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11161">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11161">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11162">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자(선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식 지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11162">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11163">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11164">형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11164">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11165">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11165">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11166">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11166">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11167">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11167">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11168">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11168">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11169">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11169">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11170">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11170">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11171">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11171">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11172">unformatted:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11172">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11173">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11173">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11174">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11174">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11175">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11175">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11176">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11176">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11177">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11177">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11178">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11178">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11179">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11179">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11180">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11180">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11181">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11181">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11182">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11182">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11183">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11183">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11184">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11184">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11185">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11185">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11186">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11186">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11187">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11187">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11188">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11188">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11189">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11189">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11190">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11190">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11191">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11191">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11192">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11192">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11193">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11193">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11194">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11194">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11195">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11195">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11196">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11196">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11197">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11197">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11198">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11198">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11199">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11199">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11200">에서</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11200">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11201">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11201">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11202">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11202">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11203">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11204">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11204">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11205">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강합니다. 여기서 숫자의 특정 부분이 유효한 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11205">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11206">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11206">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11207">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 찾아보세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11207">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11208">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11208">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11209">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자(ddddddd)로 서식이 지정되지 않은 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11209">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11210">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11210">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11211">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로 포스터가 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11211">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11212">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11213">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11213">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11214">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11215">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11215">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11216">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11216">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11217">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11217">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11218">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11219">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11219">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11220">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11220">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11221">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11221">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11222">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11222">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11223">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11223">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11224">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11224">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11225">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11225">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11226">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11226">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11227">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11227">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11228">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11228">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11229">SSA 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11229">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11230">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11230">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11231">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11231">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11232">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11232">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11233">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11233">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11234">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11234">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11235">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11235">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11236">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11236">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11237">SSNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11237">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11238">SSN #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11238">SSN#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11239">SS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11239">SS#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11240">SSID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11240">SSID</span></span>
   
## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11241">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11241">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11242">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11242">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11243">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11243">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11244">passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11244">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11245">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11245">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11246">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11247">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11247">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11248">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11249">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11249">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11250">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11251">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11251">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11252">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11253">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11253">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11254">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11254">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11255">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11255">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11276">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11276">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11277">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11277">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11278">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11278">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11279">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11279">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11280">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11280">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11281">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11281">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11282">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11282">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11283">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11284">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11285">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11286">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11286">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11287">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11288">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11288">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11289">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11290">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11291">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11291">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11292">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11292">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11294">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11294">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11295">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11295">ukraine passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11299">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11299">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11300">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11300">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11301">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11301">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11302">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11302">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11303">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11303">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11304">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11304">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11305">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11305">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11306">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11306">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11307">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11307">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11308">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11308">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11309">8자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11309">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11310">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11310">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11311">8자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11311">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11312">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11312">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11313">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11313">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11314">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11314">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11315">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11315">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11316">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11316">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11317">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11317">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11318">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11318">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11319">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11319">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11320">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11320">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11321">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11321">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11322">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11322">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11323">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11323">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11324">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11324">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11325">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11325">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4e51b-11326">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4e51b-11326">номер паспорта</span></span>
